headline: KKR makes surprise move to brew up Costa Coffee bid
summary: The American investment giant KKR has made a surprise move to buy Costa Coffee, one of Britain's biggest high street hospitality groups.  Sky News has learnt that KKR is among a small number of parties in talks with The Coca-Cola Company and its advisers at Lazard, the investment bank, about a deal.  KKR's involvement in the process is unexpected because it had appeared to drop its interest in a potential bid in late August, soon after news of the auction was revealed by Sky News.

raw.headline: KKR makes surprise move to brew up Costa Coffee bid
raw.summary: The American investment giant KKR has made a surprise move to buy Costa Coffee, one of Britain's biggest high street hospitality groups.  Sky News has learnt that KKR is among a small number of parties in talks with The Coca-Cola Company and its advisers at Lazard, the investment bank, about a deal.  KKR's involvement in the process is unexpected because it had appeared to drop its interest in a potential bid in late August, soon after news of the auction was revealed by Sky News.
